scripts.clean: turbo run clean && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf .pnpm-debug.log
scripts.docker:build: cross-env COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=mirrorboards && cd docker && docker-compose build
scripts.docker:up: cross-env COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=mirrorboards && cd docker && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker:down: cross-env COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=mirrorboards && cd docker && docker-compose down
